game.name: Bridge Tactics
game.description:
Are you an adventure seeker? Do you generally search for a platform where you can practice your fighting skills? Join Bridge Tactics and get ready to witness a world full of adventurous and exciting activities! In this brand new adventure game, you will have to destroy the bridge along with the enemy soldiers. Make sure to place the bombs at the right place to kill all your enemies to clear the level. There are several surprising adventure games mystery involved here. 

It is you who will have to detonate the bombs at the right time. Click it place dynamite anywhere on the bridge. Let your enemies come and cross the bridge before clicking the dynamite to blow stuff up. Click on the Try Again button if you are not able to complete the mission timely in this free online war game! Make sure to blow up the bridge for the maximum damage of your enemies and earn the points for destroying items on it in this highly addictive destruction game. 

Try to bring your critical thinking and analytical thinking skills into use to achieve your goal in this physics puzzle game. Destroy as much of the bridge as you can while targeted at killing enemy units! Make sure to reach the target score that you will see on the right top of the screen to complete a level in this free online adventure games for boys. Like other fighting games, it will also ensure you to have a lot of fun and thrill all the time till you enjoy one of this best free games to play
